org.libav

Interface IMediaEncoder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMediaEncoder

    public interface IMediaEncoder
    Media encoder interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the media encoder, all associated stream encoders and the underlaying media writer.
      void flush()
      Flush all underlaying encoders.

      Get factory for audio stream encoders.

      Get encoder for the audio stream at the given index.

      Get underlaying media writer.

      Get factory for video stream encoders.

      Get encoder for the video stream at the given index.

      Check whether the media encoder is closed or not.

      Set factory for audio stream encoders.

      Set factory for video stream encoders.

      • close

        void close()
           throws LibavException
        Close the media encoder, all associated stream encoders and the underlaying media writer.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while closing the media encoder

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check whether the media encoder is closed or not.
        Returns:
        true if the media encoder is closed, false otherwise

      • flush

        void flush()
           throws LibavException
        Flush all underlaying encoders.
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs
